about_the_game:
Lord of Mythical Beasts is a Roguelite side-scrolling action game set in an alternate Chinese mythology world, blending martial arts, mythical beasts, and mechanical elements. Players will take on the role of a disciple of Huang Laoliu, the leader of the Beastmaster Sect, as they venture into mysterious realms to capture mythical beasts and gradually restore the sect’s reputation. By collecting mythical beasts, strengthening the sect’s power, and challenging powerful enemies, the ultimate goal is to rebuild the Beastmaster Sect’s glory and become the strongest sect in the martial world.


Story Background: In the vast martial world, there once existed a prestigious sect known as the "Beastmaster Sect." Centuries ago, the Beastmaster Sect was one of the most powerful sects, with many disciples and legendary heroes. The sect’s unique skill in controlling mythical beasts made it renowned, and these legendary beasts were not only the symbol of the sect but also the source of its immense power. During that era, the Beastmaster Sect could command all mighty creatures, with even mythical beasts becoming part of its force.

However, as time passed, the sect gradually declined. The death of the last mythical beast several centuries ago marked the loss of the sect's true power and its symbol. With the demise of the mythical beasts, the disciples dispersed, and the sect’s teachings became increasingly fragmented. Even though ancient texts speak of these beasts, many now question whether they ever truly existed.

Gameplay:

  • Capture Mythical Beasts: Explore mysterious realms to capture mythical beasts and bring them back to the sect to increase its reputation. Reputation unlocks powerful talents and the ability to summon mythical beasts for combat.

  • Diverse Combat Styles: Choose from different disciples, each with a unique fighting style—swordsmanship, firearms, martial arts, and more. Experience various combat approaches tailored to your playstyle.

  • Blessing Combinations: Strengthen your combat power with blessing combinations, creating unique battle strategies. Different blessings grant powerful buffs.

  • Skills and Enchantment System: Each disciple has unique skills that can be further enhanced through enchantments, allowing you to create powerful and personalized combat styles.

short_description: A Roguelite side-scrolling action game where you play as a disciple of a fallen sect. Capture mythical beasts to boost your faction’s reputation, unlock powerful talents, and face deadly enemies in dungeons. Strive to restore your sect’s former glory and become the strongest in the world.
